content.text: The code repository located at /tmp/workdir/search_strands_20260128/rockpaperscissors is currently written in Java 8. Please migrate the entire codebase to Java 17.

reasoningText.text:
Let me start by exploring the repository structure to understand the codebase and then migrate it from Java 8 to Java 17.

First, I'll:
1. View the directory structure
2. Check for pom.xml or build.gradle files
3. Look at the source code
4. Update the build configuration to use Java 17
5. Check for any Java 8 specific code that needs updating
6. Run tests to ensure everything works

<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
  <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
  <parent>
    <groupId>com.jcabi</groupId>
    <artifactId>parent</artifactId>
    <version>0.50.7</version>
  </parent>
  <groupId>com.github.fabriciofx</groupId>
  <artifactId>rockpaperscissors</artifactId>
  <version>1.3</version>
  <packaging>jar</packaging>
  <name>rockpaperscissors</name>
  <description>
    A true OO implementation of the rock, paper and scissors game
  </description>
  <url>https://github.com/fabriciofx/cactoos-jdbc</url>
  <inceptionYear>2018</inceptionYear>
  <organization>
    <name>rockpaperscissors</name>
    <url>https://github.com/fabriciofx/rockpaperscissors</url>
  </organization>
  <licenses>
    <license>
      <name>MIT</name>
      <url>https://github.com/fabriciofx/rockpaperscissors/LICENSE.txt</url>
      <distribution>site</distribution>
    </license>
  </licenses>
  <developers>
    <developer>
      <id>1</id>
      <name>Fabricio Barros Cabral</name>
      <email>fabriciofx@gmail.com</email>
      <organization>fabriciofx</organization>
      <organizationUrl>https://github.com/fabriciofx</organizationUrl>
      <roles>
        <role>Architect</role>
        <role>Developer</role>
      </roles>
      <timezone>-7</timezone>
    </developer>
  </developers>
  <issueManagement>
    <system>GitHub</system>
    <url>https://github.com/fabriciofx/rockpaperscissors/issues</url>
  </issueManagement>
  <scm>
    <connection>scm:git:git@github.com:fabriciofx/rockpaperscissors.git</connection>
    <developerConnection>
      scm:git:git@github.com:fabriciofx/rockpaperscissors.git
    </developerConnection>
    <url>https://github.com/fabriciofx/rockpaperscissors</url>
  </scm>
  <ciManagement>
    <system>rultor</system>
    <url>http://www.rultor.com/s/rockpaperscissors</url>
  </ciManagement>
  <distributionManagement>
    <site>
      <id>github-pages</id>
      <url>https://github.com/fabriciofx/rockpaperscissors</url>
    </site>
  </distributionManagement>
  <build>
    <pluginManagement>
      <plugins>
        <plugin>
          <artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin</artifactId>
          <configuration>
            <source>1.8</source>
            <target>1.8</target>
          </configuration>
        </plugin>
      </plugins>
    </pluginManagement>
    <plugins>
      <plugin>
        <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
        <artifactId>maven-assembly-plugin</artifactId>
        <version>3.3.0</version>
        <executions>
          <execution>
            <id>make-assembly</id>
            <phase>package</phase>
            <goals>
              <goal>single</goal>
            </goals>
            <configuration>
              <archive>
                <manifest>
                  <mainClass>
                    com.github.fabriciofx.rps.RockPaperScissors
                  </mainClass>
                </manifest>
              </archive>
              <descriptorRefs>
                <descriptorRef>jar-with-dependencies</descriptorRef>
              </descriptorRefs>
            </configuration>
          </execution>
        </executions>
      </plugin>
    </plugins>
  </build>
  <profiles>
    <profile>
      <id>qulice</id>
      <build>
        <plugins>
          <plugin>
            <groupId>com.qulice</groupId>
            <artifactId>qulice-maven-plugin</artifactId>
            <version>0.18.19</version>
            <configuration>
              <excludes combine.children="append">
                <exclude>checkstyle:/src/site/resources/.*</exclude>
                <exclude>findbugs:.*</exclude>
              </excludes>
            </configuration>
          </plugin>
          <plugin>
            <groupId>org.jacoco</groupId>
            <artifactId>jacoco-maven-plugin</artifactId>
            <version>0.8.6</version>
            <configuration>
              <output>file</output>
            </configuration>
            <executions>
              <execution>
                <id>jacoco-initialize</id>
                <goals>
                  <goal>prepare-agent</goal>
                </goals>
              </execution>
              <execution>
                <id>jacoco-check</id>
                <phase>test</phase>
                <goals>
                  <goal>check</goal>
                </goals>
                <configuration>
                  <rules>
                    <rule>
                      <element>BUNDLE</element>
                      <limits>
                        <limit>
                          <counter>INSTRUCTION</counter>
                          <value>COVEREDRATIO</value>
                          <minimum>0.29</minimum>
                        </limit>
                        <limit>
                          <counter>LINE</counter>
                          <value>COVEREDRATIO</value>
                          <minimum>0.29</minimum>
                        </limit>
                        <limit>
                          <counter>BRANCH</counter>
                          <value>COVEREDRATIO</value>
                          <minimum>0.21</minimum>
                        </limit>
                        <limit>
                          <counter>COMPLEXITY</counter>
                          <value>COVEREDRATIO</value>
                          <minimum>0.22</minimum>
                        </limit>
                        <limit>
                          <counter>METHOD</counter>
                          <value>COVEREDRATIO</value>
                          <minimum>0.23</minimum>
                        </limit>
                        <limit>
                          <counter>CLASS</counter>
                          <value>MISSEDCOUNT</value>
                          <maximum>17</maximum>
                        </limit>
                      </limits>
                    </rule>
                  </rules>
                </configuration>
              </execution>
              <execution>
                <id>jacoco-site</id>
                <phase>install</phase>
                <goals>
                  <goal>report</goal>
                </goals>
              </execution>
            </executions>
          </plugin>
        </plugins>
      </build>
    </profile>
  </profiles>
</project>

  </parent>
  <groupId>com.github.fabriciofx</groupId>
  <artifactId>rockpaperscissors</artifactId>

  <description>
    A true OO implementation of the rock, paper and scissors game
  </description>

      <name>MIT</name>

      <distribution>site</distribution>
    </license>
  </licenses>
  <developers>
    <developer>
      <id>1</id>
      <name>Fabricio Barros Cabral</name>
      <email>fabriciofx@gmail.com</email>
      <organization>fabriciofx</organization>
      <organizationUrl>https://github.com/fabriciofx</organizationUrl>
      <roles>
        <role>Architect</role>
        <role>Developer</role>
      </roles>
      <timezone>-7</timezone>
    </developer>
  </developers>
  <issueManagement>
    <system>GitHub</system>
    <url>https://github.com/fabriciofx/rockpaperscissors/issues</url>
  </issueManagement>
  <scm>
    <connection>scm:git:git@github.com:fabriciofx/rockpaperscissors.git</connection>
    <developerConnection>
      scm:git:git@github.com:fabriciofx/rockpaperscissors.git
    </developerConnection>
    <url>https://github.com/fabriciofx/rockpaperscissors</url>
  </scm>
  <ciManagement>
    <system>rultor</system>
    <url>http://www.rultor.com/s/rockpaperscissors</url>
  </ciManagement>
  <distributionManagement>
    <site>
      <id>github-pages</id>
      <url>https://github.com/fabriciofx/rockpaperscissors</url>
    </site>
  </distributionManagement>
  <build>
    <pluginManagement>
      <plugins>
        <plugin>
          <artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin</artifactId>
          <configuration>
            <source>17</source>
            <target>17</target>
            <release>17</release>
          </configuration>
        </plugin>
      </plugins>
    </pluginManagement>
    <plugins>
      <plugin>
        <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
        <artifactId>maven-assembly-plugin</artifactId>
        <version>3.7.1</version>
        <executions>
          <execution>
            <id>make-assembly</id>
            <phase>package</phase>
            <goals>
              <goal>single</goal>
            </goals>
            <configuration>
              <archive>
                <manifest>
                  <mainClass>
                    com.github.fabriciofx.rps.RockPaperScissors
                  </mainClass>
                </manifest>
              </archive>
              <descriptorRefs>
                <descriptorRef>jar-with-dependencies</descriptorRef>
              </descriptorRefs>
            </configuration>
          </execution>
        </executions>
      </plugin>
    </plugins>
  </build>
  <profiles>
    <profile>
      <id>qulice</id>
      <build>
        <plugins>
          <plugin>
            <groupId>com.qulice</groupId>
            <artifactId>qulice-maven-plugin</artifactId>
            <version>0.22.2</version>
            <configuration>
              <excludes combine.children="append">
                <exclude>checkstyle:/src/site/resources/.*</exclude>
                <exclude>findbugs:.*</exclude>
              </excludes>
            </configuration>
          </plugin>
          <plugin>
            <groupId>org.jacoco</groupId>
            <artifactId>jacoco-maven-plugin</artifactId>
            <version>0.8.12</version>
            <configuration>
              <output>file</output>
            </configuration>
            <executions>
              <execution>
                <id>jacoco-initialize</id>
                <goals>
                  <goal>prepare-agent</goal>
                </goals>
              </execution>
              <execution>
                <id>jacoco-check</id>
                <phase>test</phase>
                <goals>
                  <goal>check</goal>
                </goals>
                <configuration>
                  <rules>
                    <rule>
                      <element>BUNDLE</element>
                      <limits>
                        <limit>
                          <counter>INSTRUCTION</counter>
                          <value>COVEREDRATIO</value>
                          <minimum>0.29</minimum>
                        </limit>
                        <limit>
                          <counter>LINE</counter>
                          <value>COVEREDRATIO</value>
                          <minimum>0.29</minimum>
                        </limit>
                        <limit>
                          <counter>BRANCH</counter>
                          <value>COVEREDRATIO</value>
                          <minimum>0.21</minimum>
                        </limit>
                        <limit>
                          <counter>COMPLEXITY</counter>
                          <value>COVEREDRATIO</value>
                          <minimum>0.22</minimum>
                        </limit>
                        <limit>
                          <counter>METHOD</counter>
                          <value>COVEREDRATIO</value>
                          <minimum>0.23</minimum>
                        </limit>
                        <limit>
                          <counter>CLASS</counter>
                          <value>MISSEDCOUNT</value>
                          <maximum>17</maximum>
                        </limit>
                      </limits>
                    </rule>
                  </rules>
                </configuration>
              </execution>
              <execution>
                <id>jacoco-site</id>
                <phase>install</phase>
                <goals>
                  <goal>report</goal>
                </goals>
              </execution>
            </executions>
          </plugin>
        </plugins>
      </build>
    </profile>
  </profiles>
</project>

input.file_text:
# Java 8 to Java 17 Migration Summary

## Migration Date
January 29, 2026

## Overview
The Rock Paper Scissors project has been successfully migrated from Java 8 to Java 17.

## Changes Made

### 1. pom.xml Updates

#### Parent POM Version
- **Before**: com.jcabi:parent version 0.50.7
- **After**: com.jcabi:parent version 0.68.0
- **Reason**: Updated to latest version with Java 17 support

#### Maven Compiler Plugin
- **Before**: 
  - source: 1.8
  - target: 1.8
- **After**: 
  - source: 17
  - target: 17
  - release: 17
- **Reason**: Set Java 17 as the compilation target

#### Plugin Updates
1. **maven-assembly-plugin**
   - Before: 3.3.0
   - After: 3.7.1
   
2. **qulice-maven-plugin**
   - Before: 0.18.19
   - After: 0.22.2
   
3. **jacoco-maven-plugin**
   - Before: 0.8.6
   - After: 0.8.12

### 2. Source Code
- **No source code changes required**: The codebase was already compatible with Java 17
- All existing Java code compiled successfully with Java 17
- No deprecated APIs or incompatible features were found

## Verification Results

### Build Status
✅ **SUCCESS**: `mvn clean verify` passes successfully

### Test Results
- Total Tests: 10
- Passed: 10
- Failed: 0
- Errors: 0
- Skipped: 0

### Bytecode Verification
- Compiled classes use bytecode version 61 (Java 17)
- JAR manifest confirms: `Build-Jdk-Spec: 17`

## Compatibility Notes

### What Works
- All unit tests pass
- All compilation succeeds
- JAR packaging works correctly
- Application can be executed with Java 17

### Java 17 Features Available (Optional Future Enhancements)
While not required for this migration, the codebase can now leverage Java 17 features:
- Text Blocks (Java 13+)
- Pattern Matching for instanceof (Java 16+)
- Records (Java 16+)
- Sealed Classes (Java 17)
- Enhanced Switch Expressions (Java 14+)

## Build Commands

### Clean and Build
```bash
mvn clean verify
```

### Run Application
```bash
java -jar target/rockpaperscissors-1.3-jar-with-dependencies.jar --cli
```

or 

```bash
java -jar target/rockpaperscissors-1.3-jar-with-dependencies.jar --gui
```

## Dependencies
The project uses the jcabi parent POM which manages most dependencies. All transitive dependencies are compatible with Java 17.

## Conclusion
The migration was successful with minimal changes required. The project is now fully compatible with Java 17 and ready for production use.

Perfect! Let me create a summary of all changes:

## Migration Summary

I have successfully migrated the Rock Paper Scissors Java project from Java 8 to Java 17. Here's what was done:

### ✅ Changes Made to pom.xml:

1. **Parent POM Update**
   - Updated `com.jcabi:parent` from version `0.50.7` to `0.68.0`
   - This provides Java 17 compatibility and updated plugin versions

2. **Compiler Configuration**
   - Changed `source` from `1.8` to `17`
   - Changed `target` from `1.8` to `17`
   - Added `release` parameter set to `17` for better compatibility

3. **Plugin Updates**
   - `maven-assembly-plugin`: `3.3.0` → `3.7.1`
   - `qulice-maven-plugin`: `0.18.19` → `0.22.2`
   - `jacoco-maven-plugin`: `0.8.6` → `0.8.12`

### ✅ Verification Results:

- **Build Status**: ✅ SUCCESS
- **All Tests Pass**: 10/10 tests passing (0 failures, 0 errors)
- **Bytecode Version**: Major version 61 (Java 17)
- **JAR Manifest**: Confirms `Build-Jdk-Spec: 17`
- **Command**: `mvn clean verify` runs successfully

### 📝 Source Code:

No source code changes were required! The existing codebase was already compatible with Java 17. All 36 source files and 2 test files compiled successfully without any modifications.

### 🎯 Key Benefits:

The project now runs on Java 17 and can take advantage of:
- Improved performance and security
- Modern language features (if desired for future enhancements)
- Long-term support (Java 17 is an LTS release)
- Better tooling and ecosystem support

The migration is complete and the project is ready for production use with Java 17! 🚀
